nodes.text: The Imperial paratrooper force was a unit of the Imperial Military. General Rom Mohc was a highly decorated member of the Imperial paratrooper force.

The Imperial paratrooper force was first mentioned in "LucasArts Update: The Creation Story," a 1994 article written by Sue Seserman and published in Star Wars Insider 23 that previewed the then-upcoming Star Wars: Dark Forces, a first-person shooter developed and published by LucasArts and released in 1995.
